mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t21.DENAME, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEDATAID, t11.USERROLEDATANAME, t1.USERROLEDATASID, t1.USERROLEDATASNAME, t1.USERROLEID, t31.USERROLENAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATAS t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t11 ON t1.USERROLEDATAID = t11.USERROLEDATAID LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t21 ON t11.DEID = t21.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t31 ON t1.USERROLEID = t31.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t21.`DENAME`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERROLEDATAID`, t11.`USERROLEDATANAME`, t1.`USERROLEDATASID`, t1.`USERROLEDATASNAME`, t1.`USERROLEID`, t31.`USERROLENAME` FROM `T_SRFUSERROLEDATAS` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t11 ON t1.USERROLEDATAID = t11.USERROLEDATAID LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t21 ON t11.DEID = t21.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t31 ON t1.USERROLEID = t31.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t21.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEDATAID AS USERROLEDATAID, t11.USERROLEDATANAME AS USERROLEDATANAME, t1.USERROLEDATASID AS USERROLEDATASID, t1.USERROLEDATASNAME AS USERROLEDATASNAME, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t31.USERROLENAME AS USERROLENAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATAS t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t11 ON t1.USERROLEDATAID = t11.USERROLEDATAID LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t21 ON t11.DEID = t21.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t31 ON t1.USERROLEID = t31.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t21.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEDATAID AS USERROLEDATAID, t11.USERROLEDATANAME AS USERROLEDATANAME, t1.USERROLEDATASID AS USERROLEDATASID, t1.USERROLEDATASNAME AS USERROLEDATASNAME, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t31.USERROLENAME AS USERROLENAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATAS t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t11 ON t1.USERROLEDATAID = t11.USERROLEDATAID LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t21 ON t11.DEID = t21.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t31 ON t1.USERROLEID = t31.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t21.[DENAME], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERROLEDATAID], t11.[USERROLEDATANAME], t1.[USERROLEDATASID], t1.[USERROLEDATASNAME], t1.[USERROLEID], t31.[USERROLENAME] FROM [T_SRFUSERROLEDATAS] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t11 ON t1.USERROLEDATAID = t11.USERROLEDATAID LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t21 ON t11.DEID = t21.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t31 ON t1.USERROLEID = t31.USERROLEID
